title: Handle a Partial Payment on an Invoice
description: A customer makes a partial payment on an invoice. An agent must apply it and follow up on the remaining balance.

tasks.description: Receive a payment that is less than the full invoice amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags the partial payment.

tasks.description: Apply the partial payment to the invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: The invoice now shows a remaining balance due.

tasks.description: Contact the customer to inquire about the short payment and arrange for payment of the remaining balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent contacts the customer to resolve the issue.
